analyzed: āma mahā rāja sakkā assāsa passāse nirodhetunti
katha bhante nāgasena sakkā assāsa passāse nirodhetunti

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja, sutapubbo te koci kākacchamāno”ti.
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja suta pubbaḥ te koci kākacchamāno ti

original: “Kiṁ nu kho, mahārāja, so saddo kāye namite virameyyā”ti.
analyzed: kim nu kho mahā rāja saḥ saddo kāye namite virameyya ati

original: “So hi nāma, mahārāja, saddo abhāvitakāyassa abhāvitasīlassa abhāvitacittassa abhāvitapaññassa
analyzed: saḥ hi nāma mahā rāja saddaḥ abhāvita kāyassa abhāvita sīlassa abhāvita cittassa abhāvita paññassa

original: kāye namite viramissati, kiṁ pana bhāvitakāyassa bhāvitasīlassa bhāvitacittassa bhāvitapaññassa
analyzed: kāye namite viramissati kim pana bhāvita kāyassa bhāvita sīlassa bhāvita cittassa bhāvita paññassa
catuttha jhānam samāpannassa assāsa passāsāḥ na nirujjhissanti iti
